titleStmt.title: A pleasant conceite penned in verse Collourably sette out, and humblie presented on New-yeeres day last, to the Queenes Maiestie at Hampton Courte. Anno. Domini. 1593.
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Warde [in the shop of J. Charlewood], dwelling in Holburne at the signe of the Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the shop of J. Charlewood], dwelling in Holburne at the signe of the Castle
